thread.section_title: Tresor Rare Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tresor Rare | tresor-rare.com
thread.title: Tracy Ellis
thread.title_full: Tresor Rare reviewed by Tracy Ellis

author: Tracy Ellis
title: Tracy Ellis
text: Visited Puerto Banus at the end of January and found ourselves in the tresor rare shop where they were demonstrating some new products. I saw Fabio who was extremely knowledgable and careful in explaing the products. Over the weekend I tried and purchased eye lift , neck and face mask and a few other things. Fabio and the staff were extremely courteous and professional and they dispatched the product by courier to be with me when I got home emailed full instructions and offered ongoing support during this first few weeks. I love the products , very pleased with the results and look forward to staying with them in the years to come.
